pylayers.antprop.antenna.SHCoeff.s1tos2¶

SHCoeff.s1tos2(N2=-1)[source]¶

convert shape 1 –> shape 2

shape 1 array [ Nf x (N+1) x (M+1) ] shape 2 array [ Nf x (N+1)*(M+1) ] n = 0...N2 m = 0...N2

Parameters :

N2 : int <= N1

shape 1 has 3 axis - shape 2 has 2 axis by default all s1 coefficients are kept N2=-1 means N2=min(N1,M1) because M2 must be equal to N2

See also

index_vsh
